name: E Wynkoop

name: Nick Campion
text: $5 pizza with unlimited toppings. Or it might be $6. Either way it's a great deal!

name: Aly Krimmer
text: Love that they had vegan options, daiya cheese and vegan sausage, but it really grossed me out that they don't separate any of the toppings. The employees wear gloves and use their hands to scoop the toppings out to place on the pizza …More

name: Chelsea Bliss
text: This is one of my favorite places to eat here in Boulder. It’s a little pricey for pizza but I think it’s worth it because you get to make your own pizza with fresh ingredients! One of the last times I was in, things were a little behind …More

name: A R
text: Having to change my five star to a one.  This rarely happens.  The first time we went here it was good, fast, and they were very nice and explained everything.   Unfortunately for our family the next time we went was not so pleasant.  I had …More

name: Jen P
text: Great for everyone, vegan and gluten free options. Totally customizable personal pizzas made fresh and lots of topping options. Service was good and atmosphere is nice. Inexpensive and delicious; highly recommend.

name: sarah meshak
text: Great pizza! Loved the thin crust and barbecue sauce. Staff was very timely and friendly. Will come back!!

name: Neil N
text: Craft your own pizza with unlimited toppings. It's fast, filling, and not at all expensive. On Tuesdays, if you have the pizza Rev app you can get a craft your own pizza for $6 a pop.

name: Chris Moseman
text: Great spot for yummy vegan pizza.

name: N V
text: Out of all the pizza in boulder this is my favorite. You can choose crust and everything else. It's awesome and reasonable. No delivery, but easy location to pick-up. 5 stars!

name: Sandy Thrapp
text: Fresh made to order pizza Delicious! Staff was friendly and helpful. Will be going back!

name: Scott Morrison
text: Great pizza and Tuesday discount.  Build-it-yourself style.  A hard cider and a good pizza here is hard to beat.  Great in-house hot sauce selection.  Staff is efficient and relatively friendly.

name: Adrienne Myles
text: PizzaRev is probably one of the best pizza I have ever had. Totally perfection. Yummy

name: Rafael Serrano
text: Easy, fastest pizza in town, good prices, many choices. Perfect to go with the kids and for a quick bite. You can get beer, some wine and pizza at a good price. Young staff is always sweet and helpful.

name: Daryl Huschka
text: Great idea for pizza. All you want or not no your Pizza. Great place and good service.

name: Jerry Suiter
text: Nice restaurant with good selection of toppings so you can build your own. I had the thin crust which was cooked perfectly.  Very fast service however don’t have beer at this time.

name: J. S. Richards
text: Very much like other fast pizza establishments. Customize your own or pick from one of their creations. Crust was thin and crispy. There were a good variety of toppings. Only complaint was that it took about 6 minutes, not the advertised 3 minutes, to cook.

name: Oscar Banlon
text: This is different, and interesting. You can pick a personal pizza off the menu, but I think it's more fun to choose your own ingredients from the crust up. You just walk down the line making your selections, and then they cook it for you in …More

text: i always love coming here. Great pizza for a very reasonable price.

text: The most incredibly rude and incompetent employees. It took them a half hour to make a pizza with no one in the restaurant. After waiting and getting home, I opened the box to see the most sloppily thrown together pizza, and there was hair …More

name: John Hyde
text: Food is better than decent (toppings 4 out of 5 & crust 2 out of 5) and atmosphere feels like an attempt to start a franchise. While the folks are nice they need some help managing work flow. The $6 pizza Tuesday night is a good deal, but the staff gets overwhelmed easily.

name: Alexander Hoke
text: The food is pretty good and the price, especially with a coupon, is very reasonable. The 1/2 salad 1/2 pizza is a good combo

name: Jennifer A.
text: Staff is super friendly!!! There was some confusion with my online order but the manager was more than friendly. I RARELY eat out and eat a plant based diet, Pizza Rev has the BEST selection for vegan pizza in Boulder. I am more than pleased with the customer service and the pizza is so good!!! Thanks Pizza Rev I WILL order again!

name: Marina Vance
text: It's a little bit pricey, but very delicious. They have thin, thick, or gluten free crust (I wish there were a whole wheat option), and a variety of sauces and all-you-can-add toppings. It's sort of like the Subway of pizzas, except that it tastes much better.

name: Piper Hope
text: We used to love coming here but the service has gotten so slow I might as well go home and make my own pizza. It is actually faster to drive to Mod Pizza in Louisville .And aren't cooks supposed to wear hats in the kitchen?

name: Aravind V
text: One of the affordable places left in Boulder I must say! I have always made my own pizza and has always been good and tasty.

name: Ashton Howe
text: I really want to love this place because when they're having a good day (or their A staff is working) their food is great. The challenge though is that quality is so inconsistent. I've ordered maybe ten times for delivery, and usually get a …More

name: Weston Hood
text: Good pizza, cheap on Tuesday's but... They try to swizz out on the Tuesday deals unless you go and and get the phone app at least 24 hours in advance to get the coupon code. Kinda dumb who wants another app? So everytime i want pizza rev on a tuesday i gotta install and uninstall an app. Total pain

name: Jen Marson Parker
text: The pizzas are good but they've had a management change and the staff can be really, really slow.

name: Eliott
text: It is good. It has a very young staff so I always have to make sure they are wearing gloves or putting enough meat on. Good and inexpensive.

text: Tastes great, staff was mostly pretty friendly. Quick, clean place to eat, and good price point. Took off a star because the manager was rude when adjusting the price for a promotion they were running through their app.

name: issy 69
text: good flavor, the place could use some cleaning though, most of the tables were dirty and the staff there not very friendly with Hispanic looking people, you can tell the huge difference they make between white people and people from other ethnicities.

name: Marion S.
text: I love the concept of this place, but have concerns about the cleanliness.

name: Joshua J Connell
text: I go here at least once a week and the service is always with a smile. The ingredients are fresh and they build a perfect layered pizza. My favorite is their white sauce! Plus it all cooks in three minutes, great for a lunch break. Not to mention a reasonable price for a personal size pizza. So glad pizzarev came to Boulder.

name: David Wang
text: All the toppings you want for a reasonable, flat price? Yes, please! Toppings are good quality, a large variety of both meats and vegetables, all of which taste fresh. Thin crust is crispy, and the double dough is a little more substantial. …More

name: Tina Boville
text: Pizza rev allows you to build your own pizza, with a fixed price for toppings (meaning 1 topping and 10 toppings cost the same). There's two types of dough and they cook it in the fire where you can see, so you're served pretty quickly. The food is pretty good, but this is a fast food pizza, so not the best I've ever had.

name: Frankie Figs
text: Amazing pizza! Some of the best I have ever had. Great ingredients at a great price. Very clean and friendly. Will be returning many more times.

name: Jordan Flewelling
text: I generally like Pizzarev because they HAVE vegan options and now that Sundelo is gone it's hard to find good vegan pizza in Boulder :( but last night I had a bad experience ordering through hungrybuffs. They completely messed up our order …More

name: David Flaherty
text: Great food and a reasonable prices for what you get. Definitely an underrated experience. It's nice how they don't limit your options.

name: Pro Photo Rental Customer Service
text: We do company lunches from here every couple of weeks, and we couldn't be happier.  The service is amazing, and the pizzas are awesome.  The GF crust is actually quite good, and the toppings are high quality.  It's like boutique pizza taste at chain pizza prices.  Highly recommended.

name: Sandi Cook
text: Fresh food and gluten free pizza that tastes good!  Great for times when you can't agree on what kind of pizza to get.

name: salman alkandari

text: The number of toppings you can put are good enough and their Tuesdays offer of any pizza for $6 is worth it!

name: Daniel Gutman
text: I loved coming here originally and they have great quality food but now the service is slow. It took them over two hours to make my pizza when I ordered through Lodel.

text: I have had all the pizza in Boulder. This is hands down my favorite place in boulder to grab a pizza. I would rate more than 5 stars if I could.

text: If u want volume to ur pizza, this is not the place for you. Then again it is a pizza for 6 bucks/the Mc D's of the pizza. Cheap ingredients and quickly made. I suggest if you're looking for a good slice of pizza, look somewhere else...

name: Desi Parker
text: Inexperienced and over worked staff to handle the work load. Multiple mistakes in making our meals, even when guided with what ingredients to add to a pizza, those pizzas had missing and extra ingredients.

name: Chloe Riggs
text: I have Celiac, so it was very refressing to see all that they did. Glove change, squeesy bottle for sauce. Friendly workers who were extremely consider it and helpfully. Food is phenomenal and timely. Would recommend.

name: Sonja Montague MacKay
text: For service alone. I have some weird allergies and these guys went above and beyond to make sure all the ingredients were ok for me. Havent event tasted my gluten free pizza yet but thanks to the team here!

name: Kushal Joshi
text: Great Restaurant, its like a Chipotle for Pizza. The only reason its not 5 stars is because Pizza's are relatively small for the price.  Still PizzaRev is definitely worth trying as all the ingredients are fresh and the Pizza is created and baked right in front of your eyes.

name: Vinc Duran
text: Wow, I really like the choices here. It's quick to be served and the beer choices seem broad. You can completely customize your pie. Tuesday is cheap date night.

name: Amy Fishman

text: I love this place. They have amazing topping options, a friendly staff, and a solid drink selection. :)

name: Amogh Simha
text: Very disappointed with their 6$ Rewards Tuesday promotion! I signed up for it and went to the store only to find out that it takes 24 hours for it to take effect. I'm not coming back here again next Tuesday, thank you.

name: Jordan Buck
